SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
This class is responsible for managing the game logic and interactions between the model and the view.

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      public Game createGame(int gameId) throws InvalidConstructorDataException, CardNotImportedException, CardTypeMismatchException, DeckIsEmptyException
      Creates a new game with the specified gameId
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game to be created
      Returns:
      the Game object created
      Throws:
      InvalidConstructorDataException - if the ConstructorData is invalid
      CardNotImportedException - if a card is not imported
      CardTypeMismatchException - if the cardType is wrong
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the deck is empty

    • addPlayerToGame

      public Game addPlayerToGame(String username, int desiredNumberOfPlayers) throws AlreadyExistingPlayerException, AlreadyMaxNumberOfPlayersException
      Adds a player to the game
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to be added to the game
      desiredNumberOfPlayers - the desired number of players in the game
      Throws:
      AlreadyExistingPlayerException - when the player already exists in the game
      AlreadyMaxNumberOfPlayersException - when the game already has the maximum number of players

    • initializeGame

      public Game initializeGame() throws CardTypeMismatchException, InvalidConstructorDataException, CardNotImportedException, DeckIsEmptyException, AlreadyExistingPlayerException, AlreadyMaxNumberOfPlayersException, IOException, UnlinkedCardException, AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException
      Starts and initializes the game when all players are ready
      Throws:
      CardTypeMismatchException - if the card type is wrong
      InvalidConstructorDataException - if the ConstructorData is invalid
      CardNotImportedException - if a card is not imported
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the deck is empty
      AlreadyExistingPlayerException - if the player already exists
      AlreadyMaxNumberOfPlayersException - if the game already has the maximum number of players
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      UnlinkedCardException - if we want to check the links of a card that is not linked
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException

    • setMarker

      public void setMarker(Player player, Marker marker) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Set the chosen marker to the player and remove it from the available markers
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to choose the marker
      marker - the marker chosen by the player
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player doesn't exist

    • giveStarterCard

      public void giveStarterCard(Player player) throws DeckIsEmptyException, NotExistingPlayerException

      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to receive the card
      Throws:
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the deck is empty
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player doesn't exist

      Parameters:

      starterCard - the starter card that has to be given to the player
      side - the side of the card that has to be given to the player
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player doesn't exist

      public ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> takeTwoObjectiveCards() throws DeckIsEmptyException
      Give to the player 2 secret objective cards to choose from
      Returns:
      a list composed of the two secret objective cards given to the player
      Throws:
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the deck is empty

      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to receive the cards
      Throws:
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the deck is empty
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException - if there are already three cards in the player hand

    • playCard

      public Player playCard(Player player, PlayableCard cardOnField, PlayableCard cardInHand, AngleOrientation orientation) throws InvalidCardPositionException, CardTypeMismatchException, RequirementsNotMetException, AngleAlreadyLinkedException, NotExistingPlayerException
      Play a card from the hand of the player to the field
      Parameters:
      player - the player that wants to play the card
      cardOnField - the card on the field on which the card has to be played
      cardInHand - the card that has to be played
      orientation - the orientation (angle) on which the card that has to be played
      Returns:
      the player that played the card
      Throws:
      InvalidCardPositionException - if the card position is not valid
      CardTypeMismatchException - if the card type does not match
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the requirements of the card are not met
      AngleAlreadyLinkedException - if the angle is already linked to another angle
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player does not exist

    • calculateAndUpdateFinalPoints

      public void calculateAndUpdateFinalPoints() throws CardTypeMismatchException
      Calculate the final points of the players and update them
      Throws:
      CardTypeMismatchException - if one of the objective cards is wrong in type

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Player player, CardType cardType, DrawPosition drawPosition) throws DeckIsEmptyException, AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException, NotExistingPlayerException
      Draw a card from the drawing field and add it to the player hand
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to draw the card from the drawing field
      cardType - the type of the card that the player has to draw
      drawPosition - the position from where the player has to draw the card
      Throws:
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the chosen deck is empty
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException - if the player already has three cards in hand
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player does not exist

    • getCardHandler

      public CardHandler getCardHandler()
      Get the cardHandler of the controller
      Returns:
      the gameHandler of the controller

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn(Player player) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Pass the turn to the next player If a player is disconnected, the next player is the one after the disconnected player in the list
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is passing the turn
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player doesn't exist in the game

    • setPlayerDisconnected

      public void setPlayerDisconnected(String username) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Set the player status as disconnected
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that has to be disconnected from the game
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player doesn't exist in the game
